title: Jeff Regan Investigator and This Is Your FBI
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr12021/CaseClosed757.mp3  Case Closed begins with Jeff Regan, Investigator this week. We'll hear The Lady With Too Much Hair, his case from November 6, 1948. (29:55) Our second story is The Flying Thieves, from This Is Your FBI. That episode originally aired September 23, 1949. content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Jeff Regan, Investigator this week. We’ll hear The Lady With Too Much Hair, his case from November 6, 1948.

(29:55) Our second story is The Flying Thieves, from This Is Your FBI. That episode originally aired September 23, 1949.

Download CaseClosed757
